about_the_game: Restore the Elder Giants to their rightful place as masters of the Astral Sea, in the Age of Wonders 4: Giant Kings Expansion. Explore the ruins of their fallen empire, seek out forgotten crystal magic to empower your armies, and delve for forgotten treasures deep beneath the earth. Contains a new giant ruler type, dwelling and hand crafted regions to explore.
detailed_description: Restore the Elder Giants to their rightful place as masters of the Astral Sea, in the Age of Wonders 4: Giant Kings Expansion. Explore the ruins of their fallen empire, seek out forgotten crystal magic to empower your armies, and delve for forgotten treasures deep beneath the earth. Contains a new giant ruler type, dwelling and hand crafted regions to explore.
